-e ---

𔖖 #DEUS 𒀭 god ≠ 𔘪 𔕠 𔘆 𓐪 𓇪 𓊹
𔖖 #DEUS 𒋾𒉿𒊍 /tiwaz/ sun, Sun-god, God ⇔ 𔓷 ha •Hel ≠ 𔓏
𔖖 TEUS.UB = 𔖖𔓢 Tešup 𔕥 /TASU/TEŠUB/ Teshub 𐎚 𐎘 𐎁 TṮB •TEṮHUB

𒀭𒅎 ⋍ 𔖖𔓢
𒅎 TU 𔕥 /TASU/TEŠUB/ Teshub 𐎚 𐎘 𐎁, TṮB •TEṮHUB 𔖖𔓢 TEUS.UB Tešup 𔕥 /TASU/TEŠUB/ Teshub 𐎚 𐎘 𐎁 TṮB •TEṮHUB
𒅎 TER Thor Tarhun Tarhunt Tarhunta Tarhuwant 𔖖𔓢 (𔓢⋍wind) 𔕥 Theus Zeus 𔖖𔓢
𒅎 TU/TER 𔓢 thunder #TONITRUS ⇔ 𔓣 𔘣 𒉎
